result.execSummary:
The defendant Adrian R. Kiefer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to pay costs and DNA surcharge through the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office. Defendant to establish a payment plan within 60 days (12/4/15).
Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does.

Defendant shall undergo an AODA Assessment within the first 30 days and follow through with any recommendations resulting therefrom.  Defendant to undergo and follow through with any treatment or counseling recommenced by Agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Payment hearing on August 9, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Adrian R. Kiefer in court, Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. will plead today; Court reviews recomm.; Court reviews charge/penalties; Court reviews right to counsel; Def. F&V waives right; Def. pleads NC to Poss. of DP; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; parties stip. to facts; Court finds plea and waiver made FVK&I and finds Def. guilty of Poss. of DP; State heard; Def. heard; Court imposes sentence; Def. to report to P&P on Tues.

**W/H - 1 year PO
- AODA within first 30 days
- FT w/any treatment or counseling recommended
- not use/possess drugs, etc.
- $243 CC
- $200 DNA surcharge
Authorization to receive courtesy text reminders of upcoming hearings.

Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does.  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

Defendant, Adrian R. Kiefer in court, Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. heard on FTA; Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. RD 10/5/15 at 2:30pm & JT 11/4/15 at 8:30am in Br. 1; Court sets $500.00 PA Bond with conditions:  Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does.  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.
9:08 - ADA Tienstra for State. Def FTA. Court issues WA; finds probable cause.
